comment.author: 54664152@N02
comment._content:
Stunning man.Thank you!

Can anyone tell me what his headpiece is made from and what, if anything, it might signify?

comment.author: 46674789@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/54664152@N02]  I've seen porcupine quills used that way in modern native ceremonial attire.

comment.author: 54664152@N02
comment._content: Thank you so much.That looks about right...and it looks fantastic!

comment.author: 46989555@N00
comment._content: He may be one of the shamans of the tribe. Porcupine quills are often used by shamans for protection. You see similar use in the headdress of Nepalese shamans.
